comment.text: This translation key is used for the label on a form input field that allows users to enter the address of a document editing service. It appears in a location form within the PortalSettings page and is intended to provide clear context for users when they are entering this specific information.

usage.context:
<Styled.LocationForm onSubmit={onSubmit}>
 <div className="form-inputs">
 <div className="input-wrapper">
 <Label
 htmlFor="docServiceAdress"
 text={t("Settings:DocumentServiceLocationUrlApi")}
 />
 <InputBlock
 id="docServiceAdress"
 type="text"
 autoComplete="off"

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'عنوان خدمة تعديل الملف' is a literal translation of 'Document Editing Service Address' but doesn't convey the intended meaning as a URL address. It's a general description, not a location URL.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: عنوان موقع خدمة تعديل المستندات (ʿunwān mawqiʿ khidmat taʿdīl al-mustanadāt) - 'Document Editing Service Location URL' or a more contextually appropriate phrasing like 'رابط خدمة تعديل المستندات' (rābit khidmat taʿdīl al-mustanadāt) - 'Document Editing Service Link'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Adres editovací služby Dokumentu' is not the most natural or accurate translation of 'Document Editing Service Address'. It literally translates to 'Address of Document Editing Service'. A better translation would emphasize the purpose or location.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Možné vylepšení: 'Umístění služby pro úpravu dokumentů' or 'Adresa pro úpravu dokumentů'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses lowercase for the word 'služby' which doesn't match standard Czech capitalization conventions for nouns.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Změnit na 'Adres editovací služby Dokumentu' (with proper capitalization).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "die Adresse des Dokumentenbearbeitungsservices" is a literal translation but doesn't fully capture the meaning of 'Document Editing Service Address'. It's a bit clunky and doesn't sound natural in German. A more fluent translation would be 'Dokumentenbearbeitungs-Service-URL' or 'URL zum Dokumentenbearbeitungsdienst'.

The translation 'Փաստաթղթերի խմբագրման ծառայության հասցեն' is too literal and could be improved for clarity. 'Address' doesn't fully convey the meaning of a service URL. It should reflect the idea of a URL or endpoint.
The translation '文書編集サービスアドレス' is a literal translation of 'Document Editing Service Address' but lacks nuance. A more natural Japanese phrasing might be 'ドキュメント編集サービスURL' or 'ドキュメント編集サービスの場所'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ドキュメント編集サービスURL

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation "ທີ່ຢູ່ບໍລິການແກ້ໄຂເອກະສານ" literally translates to 'Address of Document Editing Service'. While understandable, a more natural and idiomatic translation of 'Document Editing Service Address' would be something like 'ທີ່ຕັ້ງບໍລິການແກ້ໄຂເອກະສານ' (Location of Document Editing Service) or 'ເຂດບໍລິການແກ້ໄຂເອກະສານ' (Area of Document Editing Service).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'ທີ່ຕັ້ງບໍລິການແກ້ໄຂເອກະສານ' or 'ເຂດບໍລິການແກ້ໄຂເອກະສານ'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Documentbewerking Serviceadres' is a literal translation that doesn't quite convey the intended meaning of 'Document Editing Service Address'. 'Documentbewerking' is accurate for 'Document Editing', but 'Serviceadres' is a very formal and not common way to say 'Service Address'.
While 'Serviceadres' isn't *wrong*, it's unnecessarily formal. A more natural phrasing would be more user-friendly.

The English content "Document Editing Service Address" is not entirely captured by the Sinhala translation "ලේඛන සංස්කරණ සේවාවේ ලිපිනය". The English phrasing implies a URL or API endpoint, which isn't reflected in the Sinhala translation.  "ලිපිනය" typically means 'address' in the physical sense.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ලේඛන සංස්කරණ සේවාවේ API முகவரி / ලේඛන සංස්කරණ සේවාවේ API முகவரி (This suggests an API address, adding clarity)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Slovak translation "Adresa editovacej služby Dokumentu" is not a natural or accurate translation of "Document Editing Service Address." It literally translates to "Address of the Document Editing Service". A more natural translation would be something like "Adresa služby na úpravu dokumentov" or "Adresa služby pre úpravu dokumentov".
The phrase "služby Dokumentu" is grammatically awkward. It's missing a preposition that would connect the service to the document appropriately.

The translation "Адреса сервиса за документ уређивање" is a literal translation but sounds awkward in Serbian. 'Уређивање' primarily means editing or revision, not service addressing. 'Document Editing Service Address' implies a URL or location, which is not accurately conveyed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: По адреса за сервис уређивања докумената

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'Адреса сервиса' is a rather formal phrasing. It might be better to adopt a more conversational tone if the overall application uses such.

The translation "Сервісна адреса редагування документів" is a literal translation but not the most natural or idiomatic way to express "Document Editing Service Address" in Ukrainian. It emphasizes the technical aspect of the address, which might not be necessary or desirable in all contexts.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more natural translation would be something like "Адреса сервісу редагування документів" or "Адреса служби редагування документів".  The choice between 'сервісу' and 'служби' depends on the specific nuance desired (service vs. department).
